title: Passenger, commercial vehicle registrations fall in August as floods, rainfall disrupt sales
description: Vehicle registrations in India saw a decline in passenger and commercial vehicle sales due to excessive rainfall and floods. However, overall registrations increased by 3% in August, driven by demand for two-wheelers and three-wheelers. Dealers are concerned about high inventory levels and are cautiously optimistic about the upcoming festive season.
